## columnSumSupremumNorm() function

Calculates the 1-Norm of a matrix `A`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function columnSumSupremumNorm<S>(A: Matrix<S>): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  A | <code>Matrix&lt;S&gt;</code> | The matrix for which to calculate the norm |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

## Example


```
const A = matrixBuilder.fromArray([[1, 2], [3, 4]]);
const norm = columnSumSupremumNorm(A); // 6

```
